title: Studio Apartment Available in Lakeview for ASAP Move IN
app_fee: $75 credit check per applicant & $150 move in fee
posting_body: ['Welcome to your new studio apartment located at 3838 Broadway St!', 'Your new studio is ready for you to move in 8/1.', 'Amenities + Features of residing at 3838 Broadway:', '- Sundeck', '- Fitness Center', '- Bike Room', '- Laundry Room', '- Complimentary Fiber Internet', '- Tenant Storage Available', '- Granite Countertops and Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Dishwasher and Microwave', '- Wood Floors', 'What’s', 'Nearby:', '- Sheridan Red Line Station', '- Sheridan & Irving Park #x9, #80, #151 Buses', '- Broadway & Irving Park: #36 and #80 Buses', '- Whole Foods', '- Target', '- El Mariachi', '- Windy City Gyros', '- Starbucks', '- Nano Sushi', '- 9Round', '- Orangetheory Fitness', 'Leasing Information:', '*$75 Credit Check per tenant or Cosigner(s)', '*$150 Move In Fee per Occupant', 'If you are interested or have any questions please contact:', 'Delaney Lippe', '224-345-0515', 'D e l a n e y @', 'd l i p p e. c', 'o m', 'BJB Properties INC', 'All pricing is subject to change', 'Pictures are for marketing purposes only and may not reflect the actual unit']
